text: Ara tomara tadera mukabilara jan'ya yathasadhya prastuta rakha sakti o asba bahini [1], ta diye tomara bhita-santrasta karabe allah‌ra satruke, tomadera satruke ebam era chara an'yaderake yaderake tomara jana na, allah‌ taderake janena [2]. Allah‌ra pathe tomara ya kichu byaya karabe tara purna pratidana tomaderake deya habe ebam tomadera prati yuluma kara habe na
